CustomField.description: Action to perform when credit card is detected. Update will mask the number. Delete will delete the entire record. Report will generate a PCIFY Log. Detection supports only Update or Report.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Action to perform when credit card is detected. Update will mask the number. Delete will delete the entire record. Report will generate a PCIFY Log. Detection supports only Update or Report.
CustomField.label: AuditAction
